author: Ylenia Gostoli
title: Phase two: Italy considers how to move on after coronavirus peak
description: Italians will live and work differently when lockdown measures are eased, but the threat of COVID-19 remains.
content: Nearly a month after a nationwide lockdown was implemented to prevent the spread of the virus that was ravaging through Italy's north, there are government discussions and public debate about moving to "phase two" - a period during which citizens will have to… [+6027 chars]
